item.content:encoded:
Glee star Cory Monteith has checked into rehab to treat substance addiction, his publicist revealed Sunday night. It is unclear what substances he is being treated for.

Sadly, this is not an April Fool's joke!

A rep for Lea Michele's boyfriend says:

"[Moteith] has voluntarily admitted himself to a treatment facility for substance addiction. He graciously asks for your respect and privacy as he takes the necessary steps towards recovery."

This news is truly sad and shocking, as there have been no reports of unprofessional behavior or hard partying from Monteith.

Cory, 30 years old, has been open about his struggles with addiction in the past and previously checking in to rehab at 19.

"I don't want kids to think it's okay to drop out of school and get high, and they'll be famous actors, too," Monteith said in 2011. "But for those people who might give up: Get real about what you want and go after it."

Our heart goes out to Monteith and we wish him a speedy recovery as he deals with his issues.

[Image via WENN.]

item.title: G.I. Joe Retaliates All The Way To The TOP Of The Easter Weekend Box Office!
item.dc:creator: Perez Hilton
item.content:encoded:
Well, well, well...

It looks as though the delayed G.I. Joe: Retaliation was worth the almost-year-long wait, after the studio pulled it from its original summer 2012 release to warrant a 3D conversion!

The Rock and Channing Tatum-starring action sequel made its much-anticipated debut this weekend at the TOP of the box office, pulling in $41.2 million between Friday and today...and $51.7 million if you include Thursday night premieres!

And if you include the overseas figures, we're talking $132 million...the biggest worldwide opener of 2013!

Not too shabby, right?!

Unfortunately, the same cannot be said for The Host, which didn't come close to competing with the weeks-old Oz The Great and Powerful!

Stephenie Meyer's sci-fi version of Twilight made a weak $11, placing it at #6 in the box office top ten!

And despite her critically-panned performance, Kim Kardashian seemed to do just fine in the numbers with her appearance in Tyler Perry's Temptation, which came in third and made $22.3 million!

But check out the full list of the weekend's top movies...AFTER THE JUMP!!!

G.I. Joe: Retaliation, $41.2 million
The Croods, $26.5 million
Tyler Perry's Temptation, $22.3 million
Olympus Has Fallen, $14 million
Oz the Great and Powerful, $11.6 million
The Host, $11 million
The Call, $4.8 million
Admission, $3.3 million
Spring Breakers, $2.8 million
The Incredible Burt Wonderstone, $1.3 million

item.content:encoded:
It's official:

Gwyneth Paltrow doesn't want ANYONE in her family to get what they want!

She has almost ENTIRELY banned her children from eating gluten or carbohydrates, and now, she won't even let her husband Chris Martin buy his band a HOUSE!

According to sources, the Coldplay frontman recently went into escrow on a 6,000 square-foot, six-bedroom property in Brentwood, California, for a little below $4 million, with the idea being that he and his bandmates could live there and record new music! Apparently, the band even swung by and performed a mini-concert together to make sure the acoustics were what they were looking for!

And they WERE...until someone's very GOOP-tastic wife got herself involved, decided that the inspection report on the house was not up to par, and demanded that her husband CANCEL the deal!

YEESH!

So apparently, Gwyneth isn't ONLY an expert in child-rearing, nutrition, and spiritual wellness, she ALSO is a skilled ANALYST of property inspection reports!

But hey! Maybe she did actually save him some costly complications that could arise in the future!

Or MAYBE she's just quickly becoming a serious 'Yoko Factor' for Coldplay!

Only time will tell!

[Image via WENN.]

item.content:encoded:
What a WONDERFUL early-Easter present this must have been!

Mekhi Phifer, who has appeared on both ER and Torchwood: Miracle Day, married his fiance, Reshelet Barnes, yesterday afternoon at the Montage Hotel in Beverly Hills!

And from what we gather, it was an absolutely STUNNING ceremony, held on an outdoor terrace with 100 of the couple's family and friends watching on!

According to eyewitness, Mekhi's son walked down the aisle with the family's chihuahua on a leash, while the groom wore a white suit and took his spot under an alter of yellow flowers, while Ribbon in the Sky by Stevie Wonder played!

But it was the bride herself who rightfully stole the show, as sources continued:

"When she made her entrance into the courtyard, Mekhi was completely overcome with emotion and you could tell she took his breath away. He had to wipe tears from his eyes for several minutes."

Awwww! This just sounds TOO touching!

We couldn't be more thrilled for you both!

Congratulations, guys!

[Image via WENN.]

item.content:encoded:
We guess it's a good thing that Lindsay Lohan is pAArtying as hard as she is while drinking working her way through Brazil!

Because it's beginning to look more and more like when she returns back to the United States, she'll be facing ACTUAL jail time for lying to the police and violating her probation in last year's PCH car accident!

As we've reported, the troubled starlet's lawyer, Mark Heller, forged a last minute plea bargain with prosecutors and Judge Jim Dabney, which require her to spend 90 days in a lockdown rehab facility, despite everyone later realizing that there being no such thing in New York state.

Therefore, we're now hearing that because the actual sentence assigned to her was, indeed, 90 days in jail that could be substituted with a lockdown treatment facility, prosecutors are now looking to amend the terms, which would either land her behind bars or in just regular rehab...and we ALL know how that's gone in the past!

Guess we'll just have to wait and see what Dabney decides should be done!

Although we doubt it's going to be in LiLo's favor, ESPECIALLY if he sees what she's been up to lately!

Ch-ch-check out Lindsay has as she took over a DJ booth at a local club in Florianopolis (above)!

Clearly, someone's VERY repentent for her past behavior, and looking to make serious, positive changes to her lifestyle so she can better herself as a human being.

Now hold on. We're going to need to practice saying that last part with a straight face.
